verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:10
verses.text: And the servants also of Huram, and the servants of Solomon, which brought gold from Ophir, brought algum trees and precious stones.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:11
verses.text: And the king made of the algum trees terraces to the house of the Lord, and to the king’s palace, and harps and psalteries for singers: and there were none such seen before in the land of Judah.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:12
verses.text: And king Solomon gave to the queen of Sheba all her desire, whatsoever she asked, beside that which she had brought unto the king. So she turned, and went away to her own land, she and her servants.
